hero.title: Let us build social media campaigns people actually connect with.
hero.description: For political promotion, campaign coverage, event invites, and creator partnerships, reach out with your goals, timeline, and expected deliverables.

highlights.label: Response Window
highlights.title: Response Window
highlights.description: Include budget range, campaign location, and timeline to help us prioritize your request.

highlights.title: Base Location

brief.label: Quick Brief
brief.title: Send collaboration details

collaborationTypes: On-ground campaign trail coverage and reporting

success.title: Brief received
